name: Toggle Setting Row
description: Label and description on the left, Switch on the right. The standard atomic unit for settings panels and preference lists.
notes: items-start on the outer flex so the switch aligns to the first line of the label text, not centered to the full description block.

variations.name: Compact
variations.description: Label only, no description. Tighter layout for dense settings lists.

variations.name: Destructive
variations.description: Label styled to signal a dangerous or irreversible toggle.
